text:
Ike Robotics | HW, SW, Systems Engineers & Product | SF ONSITE | Full Time https://www.ikerobotics.com/join-us

Autonomous trucking startup, Ike just raised a $52 million Series A to grow its team and deliver a real commercial product at scale. Our early team represents some of the top engineers and leaders in AV, formerly from Google, Uber, and Apple. We're building an incredible product and even more incredible team and culture. Here is more about us and why we're doing what we're doing: https://medium.com/ike-robotics/the-journey-ahead-for-self-d...
